verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came unto me again <S%H559><s%>, saying,

What mean you <S%H4911><s%>, that you use this proverb <S%H4912><s%> concerning the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, The fathers <S%H1><s%> have eaten <S%H398><s%> sour grapes <S%H1155><s%>, and the children <S%H1121><s%>'s teeth <S%H8127><s%> are set on edge <S%H6949><s%>?
As I live <S%H2416><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>, you shall not have occasion any more to use <S%H4911><s%> this proverb <S%H4912><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Behold <S%H5315><s%>, all souls are mine <S%H5315><s%>; as the soul of the father <S%H1><s%>, so also the soul <S%H5315><s%> of the son <S%H1121><s%> is mine <S%H5315><s%>: the soul that sins <S%H2398><s%>, it shall die <S%H4191><s%>.
But if a man <S%H376><s%> be just <S%H6662><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right <S%H6666><s%>,

And has not eaten <S%H398><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, neither has lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> to the idols <S%H1544><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, neither has defiled <S%H2930><s%> his neighbors <S%H7453><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>, neither has come near <S%H7126><s%> to a menstruous <S%H5079><s%> woman <S%H802><s%>,

And has not oppressed <S%H3238><s%> any <S%H376><s%>, but has restored <S%H7725><s%> to the debtor <S%H2326><s%> his pledge <S%H2258><s%>, has spoiled <S%H1497><s%> none by violence <S%H1500><s%>, has given <S%H5414><s%> his bread <S%H3899><s%> to the hungry <S%H7457><s%>, and has covered <S%H3680><s%> the naked <S%H5903><s%> with a garment <S%H899><s%>;

He that has not given forth <S%H5414><s%> upon usury <S%H5392><s%>, neither has taken <S%H3947><s%> any increase <S%H8636><s%>, that has withdrawn <S%H7725><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> from iniquity <S%H5766><s%>, has executed <S%H6213><s%> true <S%H571><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> between man <S%H376><s%> and man <S%H376><s%>,

Has walked <S%H1980><s%> in my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and has kept <S%H8104><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%>, to deal <S%H6213><s%> truly <S%H571><s%>; he is just <S%H6662><s%>, he shall surely <S%H2421><s%> live <S%H2421><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>.

If he beget <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> that is a robber <S%H6530><s%>, a shedder <S%H8210><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%>, and that does <S%H6213><s%> the like <S%H251><s%> to any one of these things <S%H259><s%>,
And that does <S%H6213><s%> not any of those duties <S%H398><s%>, but even has eaten upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and defiled <S%H2930><s%> his neighbors <S%H7453><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>,

Has oppressed <S%H3238><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy <S%H34><s%>, has spoiled <S%H1497><s%> by violence <S%H1500><s%>, has not restored <S%H7725><s%> the pledge <S%H2258><s%>, and has lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> to the idols <S%H1544><s%>, has committed <S%H6213><s%> abomination <S%H8441><s%>,

Has given forth <S%H5414><s%> upon usury <S%H5392><s%>, and has taken <S%H3947><s%> increase <S%H8636><s%>: shall he then live <S%H2425><s%>? he shall not live <S%H2421><s%>: he has done <S%H6213><s%> all these abominations <S%H8441><s%>; he shall surely <S%H4191><s%> die <S%H4191><s%>; his blood shall be upon him <S%H1818><s%>.

Now <S%H3205><s%>, behold, if he beget a son <S%H1121><s%>, that sees <S%H7200><s%> all his father <S%H1><s%>'s sins <S%H2403><s%> which he has done <S%H6213><s%>, and considers <S%H7200><s%>, and does <S%H6213><s%> not such like <S%H2004><s%>,

That has not eaten <S%H398><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, neither has lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> to the idols <S%H1544><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, has not defiled <S%H2930><s%> his neighbors <S%H7453><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>,

Neither has oppressed <S%H3238><s%> any <S%H376><s%>, has not withheld <S%H2254><s%> the pledge <S%H2258><s%>, neither has spoiled <S%H1497><s%> by violence <S%H1500><s%>, but has given <S%H5414><s%> his bread <S%H3899><s%> to the hungry <S%H7457><s%>, and has covered <S%H3680><s%> the naked <S%H5903><s%> with a garment <S%H899><s%>,

That has taken off <S%H7725><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> from the poor <S%H6041><s%>, that has not received <S%H3947><s%> usury <S%H5392><s%> nor increase <S%H8636><s%>, has executed <S%H6213><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%>, has walked <S%H1980><s%> in my statutes <S%H2708><s%>; he shall not die <S%H4191><s%> for the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of his father <S%H1><s%>, he shall surely <S%H2421><s%> live <S%H2421><s%>.

As for his father <S%H1><s%>, because he cruelly <S%H6233><s%> oppressed <S%H6231><s%>, spoiled <S%H1497><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> by violence <S%H1499><s%>, and did <S%H6213><s%> that which is not good <S%H2896><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>, behold <S%H4191><s%>, even he shall die in his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.

Yet say <S%H559><s%> you <S%H1121><s%>, Why? does not the son bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the father <S%H1><s%>? When the son <S%H1121><s%> has done <S%H6213><s%> that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right <S%H6666><s%>, and has kept <S%H8104><s%> all my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and has done <S%H6213><s%> them <S%H2421><s%>, he shall surely live <S%H2421><s%>.

The soul <S%H5315><s%> that sins <S%H2398><s%>, it shall die <S%H4191><s%>. The son <S%H1121><s%> shall not bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the father <S%H1><s%>, neither shall the father <S%H1><s%> bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the son <S%H1121><s%>: the righteousness <S%H6666><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be upon him <S%H7564><s%>, and the wickedness of the wicked shall be upon him <S%H7563><s%>.

But if the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will turn <S%H7725><s%> from all his sins <S%H2403><s%> that he has committed <S%H6213><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%> all my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right <S%H6666><s%>, he shall surely <S%H2421><s%> live <S%H2421><s%>, he shall not die <S%H4191><s%>.

All his transgressions <S%H6588><s%> that he has committed <S%H6213><s%>, they shall not be mentioned <S%H2142><s%> unto him <S%H6666><s%>: in his righteousness that he has done <S%H6213><s%> he shall live <S%H2421><s%>.

Have I any pleasure <S%H2654><s%> at all <S%H2654><s%> that the wicked <S%H7563><s%> should die <S%H4194><s%>? says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>: and not that he should return <S%H7725><s%> from his ways <S%H1870><s%>, and live <S%H2421><s%>?

But when the righteous <S%H6662><s%> turns away <S%H7725><s%> from his righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, and commits <S%H6213><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%>, and does <S%H6213><s%> according to all the abominations <S%H8441><s%> that the wicked <S%H7563><s%> man does <S%H6213><s%>, shall he live <S%H2425><s%>? All his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> that he has done <S%H6213><s%> shall not be mentioned <S%H2142><s%>: in his trespass <S%H4603><s%> that he has trespassed <S%H4604><s%>, and in his sin <S%H2403><s%> that he has sinned <S%H2398><s%>, in them shall he die <S%H4191><s%>.

Yet you say <S%H559><s%>, The way <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> is not equal <S%H8505><s%>. Hear <S%H8085><s%> now <S%H1004><s%>, O house of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; Is not my way <S%H1870><s%> equal <S%H8505><s%>? are not your ways <S%H1870><s%> unequal <S%H8505><s%>?

When a righteous <S%H6662><s%> man turns away <S%H7725><s%> from his righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, and commits <S%H6213><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%>, and dies <S%H4191><s%> in them <S%H5766><s%>; for his iniquity that he has done <S%H6213><s%> shall he die <S%H4191><s%>.

Again <S%H7563><s%>, when the wicked man turns away <S%H7725><s%> from his wickedness <S%H7564><s%> that he has committed <S%H6213><s%>, and does <S%H6213><s%> that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right <S%H6666><s%>, he shall save <S%H2421><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> alive <S%H2421><s%>.

Because he considers <S%H7200><s%>, and turns away <S%H7725><s%> from all his transgressions <S%H6588><s%> that he has committed <S%H6213><s%>, he shall surely <S%H2421><s%> live <S%H2421><s%>, he shall not die <S%H4191><s%>.

Yet says <S%H559><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, The way <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> is not equal <S%H8505><s%>. O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, are not my ways <S%H1870><s%> equal <S%H8505><s%>? are not your ways <S%H1870><s%> unequal <S%H8505><s%>?

Therefore I will judge <S%H8199><s%> you <S%H1004><s%>, O house of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> according to his ways <S%H1870><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>. Repent <S%H7725><s%>, and turn <S%H7725><s%> yourselves from all your transgressions <S%H6588><s%>; so iniquity <S%H5771><s%> shall not be your ruin <S%H4383><s%>.

Cast away <S%H7993><s%> from you all your transgressions <S%H6588><s%>, by which you have transgressed <S%H6586><s%>; and make <S%H6213><s%> you a new <S%H2319><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> and a new <S%H2319><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%>: for why will you die <S%H4191><s%>, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>?

For I have no pleasure <S%H2654><s%> in the death <S%H4194><s%> of him that dies <S%H4191><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>: therefore turn <S%H7725><s%> yourselves <S%H2421><s%>, and live you.
